compliant.section: Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us.
compliant.legal provisions: This section defines 'controllers' and outlines the responsibilities of joint controllers, aligning with GDPR requirements.

compliant.section: With business partners: We may share Your information with Our business partners to offer You certain products, services or promotions.
compliant.legal provisions: This section refers to data processing agreements, a GDPR requirement when sharing data with third parties.

non_compliant.section: With other users: when You share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside.
non_compliant.legal provisions: This section raises concerns about "publicly distributed outside," potentially contradicting the "integrity and confidentiality" principle and lacking specific security measures.
non_compliant.amend: It should be clarified how the company ensures data security and limits processing to specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes, even when users interact publicly. Consider adding: "We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal information shared in public areas, but please be aware that no system is completely secure. You are responsible for the information you choose to share publicly."
